record_type.description: Identifies the type of the resource.

phone_numbers.description: Phone numbers associated with this portout

authorized_name.description: Name of person authorizing the porting order

carrier_name.description: Carrier the number will be ported out to

end_user_name.description: Person name or company name requesting the port

city.description: City or municipality of billing address

state.description: State, province, or similar of billing address

items.description: A link to the Local Service Request

pon.description: Port order number assigned by the carrier the number will be ported out to

reason.description: The reason why the order is being rejected by the user. If the order is authorized, this field can be left null

rejection_code.description: The rejection code for one of the valid rejections to reject a port out order

service_address.description: First line of billing address (street address)

foc_date.description: ISO 8601 formatted Date/Time of the FOC date

requested_foc_date.description: ISO 8601 formatted Date/Time of the user requested FOC date

support_key.description: A key to reference this port out request when contacting Telnyx customer support

already_ported.description: Is true when the number is already ported

user_id.description: Identifies the user (or organization) who requested the port out

created_at.description: ISO 8601 formatted date of when the portout was created

inserted_at.description: ISO 8601 formatted date of when the portout was created

updated_at.description: ISO 8601 formatted date of when the portout was last updated
